official_title: A concurrent resolution to congratulate radio station WOSU-AM on the anniversary of its sixtieth year of operation.

summary.text: Extends congressional congratulations to the radio station WOSU-AM, a broadcasting service of the Ohio State University, on its 60th anniversary.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to congratulate radio station WOSU-AM on the anniversary of its sixtieth year of operation.
